column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Moved to Houston on early 2016 from Singapore
column2: I have been on the quest to find a nice and AUTHENTIC ramen place in Houston. Well
column3: my quest was over when I found Jinya. The ramen broth just delicious and the most authentic taste of Ramen in Houston. As someone who was born and raise in South East Asia and Japanese food has been part of my diet
column4: it is nice to have Jinya around when I crave for a good bowl of noodle.
